A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An absolutely atrocious film.

Pluses - some good battle scenes

Negatives - 
Lazy storytelling. Disjointed.
Absolutely crucifies the established star wars 'rules' 
Insanely unbelievable antics even by the standards of these kinds of films. 
Even important characters seem to be merely bit-part\, made of glass\, a bit like the super weapons the First Order like to create

all of that combines resulting in a film that lacks gravity (laser cannons in SPACE aside\, jesus christ) - characters\, events and items have no impact beyond pathetically thin plot devices. 

The film drags and is average by sci-fi standards. As a Star Wars film it has perhaps done more to destroy the franchise for those that know it more than any other film yet to be released. It will destroy any Star Wars fan faster than a couple of fighters kill Planet-sized death stars in this universe.
